body_html: @alexmonroe87 currently most of the higher level linear algebra ops (cholesky, determinant, matrix_inverse, matrix_solve etc.) are CPU only. There has been some interest in contributing GPU implementations based on the cuSolver library, but no recent progress. See #2217
body_text: @alexmonroe87 currently most of the higher level linear algebra ops (cholesky, determinant, matrix_inverse,  matrix_solve etc.) are CPU only. There has been some interest in contributing GPU implementations based on the cuSolver library, but no recent progress. See #2217
body: @alexmonroe87 currently most of the higher level linear algebra ops (cholesky, determinant, matrix_inverse,  matrix_solve etc.) are CPU only. There has been some interest in contributing GPU implementations based on the cuSolver library, but no recent progress. See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2217
